title: Avatar: The Way of Water

title: Spider-Man: No Way Home
subTitle: Peter Parker seeks Doctor Strange’s help to restore his secret, leading to unintended consequences and the multiverse.

title: Black Panther: Wakanda Forever
subTitle: The people of Wakanda fight to protect their home from intervening world powers as they mourn the death of King T'Challa.

title: Doctor Strange in the Multiverse of Madness
subTitle: Dr. Stephen Strange casts a forbidden spell that opens the doorway to the multiverse, including alternate versions of himself.

title: Thor: Love and Thunder
subTitle: Thor embarks on a journey unlike anything he's ever faced – a quest for inner peace, but his retirement is interrupted by Gorr the God Butcher.

title: The Batman
subTitle: Batman ventures into Gotham City's underworld when a sadistic killer leaves behind a trail of cryptic clues.
